long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Repair Road: New TikTok Game - Fix Roads with Machines!

Welcome to "Repair Road: New TikTok Game"! This unique game puts you in the shoes of a road repair engineer, using various machines and tools to fix damaged roads.

Key Features:

Diverse repair machines: In the game, you can use a variety of repair machines such as road pavers, road grinders, and patching vehicles. Each machine has its own specific function and operating method. You need to skillfully use them to fix various issues on the roads.

Challenging road conditions: The game presents different road problems, including cracks, potholes, and depressions. You must carefully observe and choose the right machines and tools to address these issues, ensuring that the roads are smooth, safe, and drivable.

Realistic operation experience: The game utilizes realistic physics engine, allowing you to operate the repair machines authentically. You need to master the controls of the machines and operate them accurately to fix the roads efficiently and maintain high quality.

Rich level design: The game offers multiple levels, each with different road problems and challenges. By solving puzzles, completing tasks, and earning rewards, you can gradually improve your repair skills and the capabilities of your machines.

TikTok social interaction: As a TikTok game, you can share your road repair process and achievements with other players. Through capturing and posting exciting repair videos, you can interact and compete with players worldwide, showcasing your repair skills and creativity.
Extension Button Menu
